name: CVE-2022-41943
description: sourcegraph is a code intelligence platform. As a site admin it was possible to execute arbitrary commands on Gitserver when the experimental `customGitFetch` feature was enabled. This experimental feature has now been disabled by default. This issue has been patched in version 4.1.0.

external_references.description: This object was created using cve2stix from the Signals Corps.
